results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-5b977c6bc8-hcf2n

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: Get "http://10.244.2.2:80/wp-admin/install.php": context deadline exceeded (Client.Timeout exceeded while awaiting headers)

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the request to the specified URL timed out.

Solution: 
1. Check network connectivity to the pod.
2. Increase the timeout setting for the readiness probe.
3. Ensure the application is running and accessible at the specified URL.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-5b977c6bc8-hcf2n], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-deployment-5b977c6bc8-hcf2n' is not ready, but 1 ready pod is expected.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs <pod-name>`.
3. Ensure readiness probes are correctly configured.
4. Restart pod if necessary with `kubectl delete pod <pod-name>`.
